        public void removeState(S state,
                        S replacement)
        Description copied from interface: ShrinkableAutomaton
        Removes a state from the automaton. All ingoing transitions to this state are redirected to the given replacement state. If a null replacement is given, then this method behaves like the above ShrinkableAutomaton.removeState(Object).
